languages.text: "Арбитес не тратят слова на прохожий сброд. Кроме того, он заслужил такие меры — при виде арбитра с кибермастифом он должен был немедленно сложить оружие и упасть на колени".

"The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."
languages.original_text: "Арбитес не тратят слова на прохожий сброд. Кроме того, он заслужил такие меры — при виде арбитра с кибермастифом он должен был немедленно сложить оружие и упасть на колени".

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

"The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

"The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and put his hands behind his head."

"The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

languages.text: “法务官绝不会与随处可见的乌合之众浪费口舌。而且，我的做法合情合理。看到带着生化獒犬的法务官时，就该立刻放下武器，跪在地上。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

traits.locale_text: “法务官绝不会与随处可见的乌合之众浪费口舌。而且，我的做法合情合理。看到带着生化獒犬的法务官时，就该立刻放下武器，跪在地上。”
“法务官绝不会与随处可见的乌合之众浪费口舌。而且，我的做法合情合理。看到带着生化獒犬的法务官时，就该立刻放下武器，把双手放在脑后。”

languages.text: 「高等裁定局が、その場限りの下賤な連中に言葉を浪費することはありません。それに、私のやり方は正当なものです。アービトレイターがサイバーマスチフを連れて現れた時点で、彼はただちに武器を捨て、膝をつくべきだったのです」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局が、その場限りの下賤な連中に言葉を浪費することはありません。それに、私のやり方は正当なものです。アービトレイターがサイバーマスチフを連れて現れた時点で、彼はただちに武器を捨て、頭の後ろで手を組むべきだったのです」
「高等裁定局が、その場限りの下賤な連中に言葉を浪費することはありません。それに、私のやり方は正当なものです。アービトレイターがサイバーマスチフを連れて現れた時点で、彼はただちに武器を捨て、頭の後ろで手を組むべきだったのです」

languages.text: «El Adeptus Arbites no malgasta saliva con la vulgar chusma. Además, mis métodos estaban justificados: nada más ver a un Arbitrator con un cibermastín, debió deponer el arma inmediatamente y arrodillarse».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Arbites no malgasta saliva con la vulgar chusma. Además, mis métodos estaban justificados: nada más ver a un Arbitrator con un cibermastín, debió deponer el arma inmediatamente y arrodillarse».

«El Adeptus Arbites no malgasta saliva con la vulgar chusma. Además, mis métodos estaban justificados: nada más ver a un Arbitrator con un cibermastín, debió deponer el arma inmediatamente y llevarse las manos a la nuca».

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites, ayaktakımına laf yetiştirmekle uğraşmaz. Ayrıca yöntemlerimin etkinliği kanıtlanmış zaten. Siber mastifli bir Yargıcı görür görmez silahını atıp dizlerinin üzerine çökmesi lazımdı."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites, ayaktakımına laf yetiştirmekle uğraşmaz. Ayrıca yöntemlerimin etkinliği kanıtlanmış zaten. Siber mastifli bir Yargıcı görür görmez silahını atıp dizlerinin üzerine çökmesi lazımdı."

"Adeptus Arbites, ayaktakımına laf yetiştirmekle uğraşmaz. Ayrıca yöntemlerimin etkinliği kanıtlanmış zaten. Siber mastifli bir Yargıcı görür görmez silahını atıp ellerini başının arkasına alması lazımdı."

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Arbites ne perd pas son temps avec la populace. En outre, mes méthodes étaient justifiées. Il aurait dû déposer ses armes et se mettre à genou à la seule vue d'un arbitrator accompagné d'un cyber-mastiff. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Arbites ne perd pas son temps avec la populace. En outre, mes méthodes étaient justifiées. Il aurait dû déposer ses armes et se mettre à genou à la seule vue d'un arbitrator accompagné d'un cyber-mastiff. »

« L'Adeptus Arbites ne perd pas son temps avec la populace. En outre, mes méthodes étaient justifiées. Il aurait dû déposer ses armes et mettre ses mains derrière la tête à la seule vue d'un arbitrator accompagné d'un cyber-mastiff. »

languages.text: "Der Adeptus Arbites vergeudet keine Worte für nichtswürdiges Gesindel. Und außerdem waren meine Methoden gerechtfertigt – beim Anblick eines Arbitrators mit einem Cyber-Mastiff hätte er umgehend seine Waffe senken und auf die Knie fallen müssen."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites does not waste words on passing rabble. And besides, my methods were warranted — at the sight of an Arbitrator with a cyber-mastiff, he should have immediately laid down his weapon and fallen to his knees."

traits.locale_text: "Der Adeptus Arbites vergeudet keine Worte für nichtswürdiges Gesindel. Und außerdem waren meine Methoden gerechtfertigt – beim Anblick eines Arbitrators mit einem Cyber-Mastiff hätte er umgehend seine Waffe senken und auf die Knie fallen müssen."

"Der Adeptus Arbites vergeudet keine Worte für nichtswürdiges Gesindel. Und außerdem waren meine Methoden gerechtfertigt – beim Anblick eines Arbitrators mit einem Cyber-Mastiff hätte er umgehend seine Waffe senken und die Hände hinter dem Kopf verschränken müssen."
